mapper.select: select ID as id, URL as url, crawTemplateId, crawLogId, CREATETIME as createTime from spider_craw_info where url = #{url}
select ID as id, URL as url, crawTemplateId, crawLogId, CREATETIME as createTime from spider_craw_info where id = #{id}
select ID as id, crawTemplateId, crawLogId, URL as url, CREATETIME as createTime from spider_craw_info
mapper.insert:
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id
insert into spider_craw_info( url,crawTemplateId,crawLogId ) values(#{url},#{crawTemplateId},#{crawLogId})
